TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataProviderNameConverter extends System.ComponentModel.StringConverter

Docs.summary: Creates a user-selectable list of ActiveX速 Data Objects (ADO) for the .NET Framework (ADO.NET) provider names.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The DataProviderNameConverter class is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> object that is typically referenced by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.
The names that are returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method are of ADO.NET providers, from the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactories.GetFactoryClasses%2A> method, that create data objects.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> method gets a value indicating whether the returned provider names are an exclusive list of possible values. The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> method gets a value indicating whether the returned provider names are a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter> class when the class is referenced by a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter/StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: An object implementing the that provides information about a context to a type converter so that the type converter can perform a conversion.
Docs.summary: Returns a list of the available ActiveX速 Data Objects (ADO) for the .NET Framework (ADO.NET) provider names.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> containing the names of the available ADO.NET providers.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The GetStandardValues method uses the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactories.GetFactoryClasses%2A> method to return a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object containing the ADO.NET provider names. It converts this <xref:System.Data.DataTable> to a string array, and then converts this array to a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> object.
The `context` parameter is not used by the GetStandardValues.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool GetStandardValuesExclusive(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: An object implementing the that provides information about a context to a type converter so that the type converter can perform a conversion.
Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the returned ActiveX速 Data Objects (ADO) for the .NET Framework (ADO.NET) provider names are an exclusive list of possible values.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If you derive a class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter> class and override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method to return an exclusive list of ADO.NET provider names, also override the GetStandardValuesExclusive method to return `true` when the provider name list is exclusive.
The `context` parameter is not used by the GetStandardValuesExclusive.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool GetStandardValuesSupported(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: An object implementing the that provides information about a context to a type converter so that the type converter can perform a conversion.
Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this object returns a standard set of ActiveX速 Data Objects (ADO) for the .NET Framework (ADO.NET) provider names that can be picked from a list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `context` parameter is not used by the GetStandardValuesSupported method.
